name: A wordcount flex template
description: An example flex template for Python.

parameters.name: input_file_pattern
parameters.label: Source
parameters.helpText: The input file pattern. Example: gs://your-bucket/your-path/*

parameters.name: output_file
parameters.label: Output destination
parameters.helpText: The path and filename prefix for writing output files. Example: gs://your-bucket/your-path
